welcome.title: Welcome, {customerName}!
welcome.greeting: Thank you for creating an account with us. We're excited to have you as part of our community!
welcome.accountActive: Your account ({customerEmail}) is now active and ready to use. You can now enjoy a faster checkout experience, track your orders, and manage your account preferences.
welcome.tipText: Save this email for your records. If you ever need to reset your password or have questions about your account, you can always reach out to our support team.
welcome.questions: If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email or contact our support team.

passwordReset.title: Reset Your Password
passwordReset.message: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password:
passwordReset.alternativeLink: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
passwordReset.expiration: This password reset link will expire in {expirationHours} hours for your security.
passwordReset.ignore: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged, and no action is required.
passwordReset.trouble: If you're having trouble with the button above, you can also reset your password by logging in and using the "Forgot Password" link.

orderConfirmation.title: Order Confirmed!
orderConfirmation.subtitle: Thank you for your order. We'll send you a shipping confirmation email as soon as your order ships.
orderConfirmation.helpText: If you have any questions about your order, please don't hesitate to contact our support team. We're here to help!
